oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
First election in Oak Ridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A crowd of people stand in line in front of a single story building. One sign states "General Election."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Automobiles; Children; Political elections; Queues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1875; 8-1-1946; Note on back reads, "First vote in O R History-J. W Mills Jr; 215 Ill Ave. Middleton L. Wooten; election official.; Arr 630a m; Mrs. Elizabeth Turner swears in officials; A F Becker; Larry p Riordan; Middleton L. Wooten; Mrs. A H Snell; Mrs. Clark Center; Mrs. Paul C Tompkins; Ed J. Glennon; 1441 Ballots cast in first area Election"
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
